title: PathUtils unit tests and coverage increased
details: Created comprehensive MSTest unit tests for PathUtils covering all public methods, including edge and error cases. Tests include: NormalizePath (null/whitespace, slash normalization), EnsureDirectoryExists (creation and normalization), GetPathRelativeToApp, GetPathRelativeToDirectory, GenerateUniqueFilePath (original and duplicate cases), MakeRelative (relative and non-relative), GetCommonBasePath (common prefix, empty, single path, no commonality). All tests pass and coverage report confirms high coverage for PathUtils.
